page.title: 13Pets of Elton children
page.content:
Most children have at least one pet,of which the most popular are cats and fish.Birds such as canaries and budgerigars are high on the list and one girl has some pigeons of her own.Tame hens are also to be included.There is a pony owner and one girl has a rabbit.In the class there are several dog owners.
DOGS,RABBITS AND FERRETS The dogs we have are used for showing and breeding.At the moment we have two litters-Great Danes and Jack Russell terriers.We also have rabbits which live in cages.We also have 13 ferrets which live in big runs,and they live on raw meat.Their job is to catch rabbits underground.
